title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4037.4 - Stewards to settle disputes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4037.4 - Stewards to settle disputes

State Regulations

If the dividing owners cannot agree as to which of them
is to have a cup or other prize that cannot be divided, the question shall be
determined by lot by the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4037.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
